posts.post_content:
I have this Pinkerton Ty Cobb SGC 30 that I would like to trade. Unfortunately it fell and needs to be reholdered (no damage to the card - I taped the case together). Would be nice for someone who has no interest in getting it graded. Would also consider selling it but mainly looking to trade plus cash for a nicer Cobb postcard. PM or email me at [url]pianni89@gmail.com[/url] if interested.

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=455807&d=1620042843[/IMG]
